welcome_sub: Explore gods, creatures and heroes from ancient cultures. Your journey to the sacred world begins here!
contact_sub: For complaints and suggestions, go to your profile and write to me.
adjust_filters: Try adjusting the filters or search terms
name: Name
already_have_account: Already have an account? Log in
subject: Subject
describe_complaint_suggestion: Describe your complaint or suggestion in detail
question_1: What value do you prioritize in a crisis?
q2_option_b: A forest or mountain (Freedom in nature)
question_3: In the face of injustice, you:
q3_option_b: Weave a cunning plan (Like a strategist)
question_9: What do you fear the most?
zeus_desc: King of the Greek gods, symbolizes authority and power. You are a natural leader who takes control in difficult situations.
hera_desc: Greek goddess of marriage and family. You are protective, loyal, and defend your loved ones with firmness.
athena_desc: Goddess of wisdom and strategic war. You are analytical, calculating, and prefer to resolve conflicts with intelligence.
apollo_desc: God of the arts, light, and truth. You are creative, balanced, and seek harmony in everything you do.
artemis_desc: Goddess of the hunt and nature. You are independent, protective of the wild, and value your freedom above all.
loki_desc: Norse god of mischief and change. You are unpredictable, cunning, and transform situations to your advantage.
thor_desc: God of thunder, brute strength, and protection. You are brave, direct, and defend those you love with all your might.
freya_desc: Norse goddess of love, beauty, and magic. You are passionate, mysterious, and attract others with your charisma.
anubis_desc: Egyptian god of the dead and funerary rites. You are fair, balanced, and guide others through important transitions.
isis_desc: Egyptian goddess of magic and healing. You are resilient, protective, and find solutions where others see problems.
hermes_desc: Messenger of the Greek gods. You are communicative, ingenious, and move between different realms with agility.
aphrodite_desc: Goddess of love and beauty. You are sensual, persuasive, and value deep emotional connections.
odin_desc: Father of all in Norse mythology, seeks knowledge and wisdom. You are strategic and value constant learning.
tyr_desc: Norse god of war and justice. You are brave, honorable, and willing to sacrifice for the greater good.
hephaestus_desc: Greek god of fire and the forge. You are creative, persevering, and turn difficulties into masterpieces.
maat_desc: Egyptian goddess of truth, justice, and cosmic order. You are balanced, fair, and seek harmony in all things.
skadi_desc: Norse goddess of winter and hunting. You are independent, strong, and find peace in the solitude of nature.
thoth_desc: Egyptian god of wisdom, writing, and magic. You are intellectual, methodical, and keep knowledge to guide others.
bastet_desc: Egyptian goddess of home, cats, and protection. You are agile, cunning, and protect with gentleness but determination.
hel_desc: Norse goddess of the underworld. You are serene, accepting the cycles of life and death with wisdom.
vote_subtitle: The most voted will be released soon
vote_success: Your vote has been successfully registered
vote_warning: You can only vote once. Your selection is permanent
vote_login_required: You must log in to vote
vote_thank_you: Thank you for voting! Your selection has been registered
